liberiaData 0.1.0

Create sp class versions of datasets

create_sp.Rd

Create sp class versions of datasets

create_sp(df, coords, proj)

Arguments

df

A data.frame of recoded indicator values for the Liberia Coverage Survey
coords

A data.frame containing per enumeration area centroid coordinates
proj

A projection string of class CRS

Value

An `sp` class version of datasets

Examples

create_sp(df = coverageData.r2, coords = sampleList.r2,
          proj = sp::CRS(sp::proj4string(gmHexGrid)))
#> class       : SpatialPointsDataFrame 
#> features    : 3425 
#> extent      : -10.79869, -10.65192, 6.238232, 6.408978  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> crs         : +proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs +ellps=WGS84 +towgs84=0,0,0 
#> variables   : 171
#> names       :        eid,         motherID,        sdate, cid, did, team, consent2,  m2, ch, mcheck1, ifa1, ifa2, ifa3, ifa3a.1, ifa3a.2, ... 
#> min values  : 3004102101, 3004102101-67-64, Aug 27, 2019,   1,   4,    1,        1,   2,  1,       1,    1,    1,    1,       0,       0, ... 
#> max values  : 3004961011,   3004961011-9-9,  Sep 5, 2019,   1,   4,    6,        2, 281,  5,       2,   99,   99,   99,       1,       1, ...
